title: Tadej Pogačar Fires Warning Shot ahead of Liège-Bastogne-Liège: ‘The Form is Good’
content:
The Slovenian superstar's been camped out at altitude before his high-profile clash with Mathieu van der Poel and a Giro d'Italia debut in May.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar Fires Warning Shot ahead of Liège-Bastogne-Liège: ‘The Form is Good’ on Velo.
author: ahood
